title: Navratna Kundanalu: Auspicious Gemstone Stud Earrings
features: Circular stud design featuring a vibrant display of Navratna gemstones set in a floral pattern. Delicate filigree work (Telugu: Jali Pani) borders the setting, complemented by CZ diamond accents. A small gold ball (gundu) dangles gracefully from the center. The earrings use a screw-back post for secure wear.
colors: with a rainbow of gemstone colors including red (Ruby)
occasions: Suitable for daily wear or special occasions. Perfect for weddings
or as an auspicious gift for any celebration.
description: The Navratna gemstones are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune to the wearer according to Vedic astrology. Meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad, the intricate design embodies traditional South Indian elegance. The screw-back posts provide extra security and comfort. A versatile piece that effortlessly blends tradition and contemporary style.
